member.name: T:Mutagen.Bethesda.Oblivion.WarmupOblivion
member.summary: A static class to house initialization warmup logic

member.name: M:Mutagen.Bethesda.Oblivion.WarmupOblivion.Init
member.summary:
Will initialize internals in a more efficient way that avoids reflection. Not required to call, but can be used to warm up ahead of time.
NOTE: Calling this warmup which is for a single game, will require you warm up other games in the same fashion. Use WarmupAll if you want all games to be warmed.
